snippet: Market tensions ease after Russia appears to back away from further action in Ukraine. | A Citigroup affiliate in Los Angeles receives a federal subpoena. | A small-business owner continues his battle against U.S. Bancorp. | Men’s Wearhouse and...
abstract: Market tensions ease after Russia appears to back away from further action in Ukraine. | A Citigroup affiliate in Los Angeles receives a federal subpoena. | A small-business owner continues his battle against U.S. Bancorp. | Men’s Wearhouse and Jos. A. Bank reach a nondisclosure accord, paving the way for a merger.
